altername_name: My Baby 2: My Baby Grew Up
My Baby 2: Mein Baby wird erwachsen!
name: My Baby: First Steps
overview: Your baby has grown* and is talking now! You have to take care of your baby! Read bedtime stories, feed your baby and let him/her play in the sandbox… Teach your baby to eat on his/her own, to dance, to go up the stairs… but above all to talk! Your heart will melt when he/she says "I love you". Buy your baby clothes and toys and decorate their room! Interact with your baby by talking to him or her and using your wiimote to make them act like a real baby. * from 14 to 30 months. Have you got the My Baby 2 Wii game? Don’t forget that you can create a photo album of your baby on the internet, using the code that you’ll find in his health record booklet.
